results.content: Really helping me understand hooks on a deep level. Loving this course so far. He really goes in depth and shows examples of the problems that hooks help us solve. Rather than simply memorizing things, he explains and walks you through why and how hooks work and when to use them. Fantastic course thus far. Very much worth the purchase. Awesome teacher.

results.content:
It' a great course about new React hooks, and as I got it for free as a promo action I cannot complain. The course covers all necessary hooks in the playground mode first with clear examples, and then you are building with the author along a real chat app with Firebase support using hooks exclusively. This is a great opportunity to be walked through as one builds a real app.

 PROs:
- quite a lot of material for the subject
- good examples in the playground
- nice to build a real example app with hooks only
- for those not familiar with Firebase great overview of Auth and DB mechanisms.

CONS:
 - some explanations are a little convoluted, like around useRef and useMemo
 - author sometimes is moving fast between the screen a lot and when a student codes along one cannot see quickly what has just been typed.
- does not cover useLayoutEffect()

But overall take this course with no doubt for better understanding of the hooks. I really appreciate how much time and effort Nathan has put into this work!

response.content:
Hi Evgenij

Thanks for the review !!!

Regarding useLayoutEffect - I was not able to find even one useful sample code so I saw no reason to mention it.
Moving sometimes fast between screen is done actually to save student time and make the lesson shorter which is very important in my opinion, because you can really fully concentrate on short lesson 5-10 minutes but not on 30 minutes lesson. Anyway, you have the code I do in every lesson attached to the lesson as a resource

Nathan
